name: underscores
description: Hi. I'm a starter theme called _s, or underscores, if you like. I'm a theme meant for hacking so don't use me as a Parent Theme. Instead try turning me into the next, most awesome, WordPress theme out there. That's what I'm here for.
author: Automattic Theme Team

scripts.watch: node-sass assets/scss/ -o dist/css/ --source-map true --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 -w
scripts.compile:css: node-sass assets/scss/ -o dist/css/ && stylelint 'dist/css/*.css' --fix || true && stylelint 'dist/css/*.css' --fix
scripts.bundle: dir-archiver --src . --dest ../alpina-teste-dev.zip --exclude .DS_Store .stylelintrc.json .eslintrc .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md composer.json composer.lock node_modules vendor package-lock.json package.json .travis.yml phpcs.xml.dist yarn.lock && rm -rf dist/
scripts.build: npm-run-all compile:css compile:rtl lint:scss lint:js bundle
